title: Inner Focus
description: Gives your ap/click a temporary boost of 100% for 5 seconds

title: Helpful Friends
description: The generosity of others grants you an unexpected bounty of ap. It pays to have a good reputation!

title: Study at the Phoenix Guild
description: Oh boy... no more adding, now we multiply your ap by 1.2 per click!

title: Hire an Apprentice
description: Earns 100ap per second more, also brings everyone else's production up by a factor of 1.2 per second.
